Package index

qPCR results

read_qpcr_amplification_csv()
Read qPCR 'Amplification Data' table from a CSV file
read_qpcr_results_csv()
Read qPCR 'Results' or 'Standard Curve Result' table from a CSV file
clean_common()
Cleaning operation applied to results and amplification csv files

Kraken results

kraken_add_taxonomy()
Add full taxonomy path to a Kraken report data frame
kraken_complete()
Complete a set of Kraken reports by filling in zero counts (Not tested!)
kraken_remove_nonstandard_ranks()
Remove nonstandard ranks from Kraken reports
read_kraken_reports()
Read one or more Kraken2 sample reports

Sequence preprocessing stats and log files

read_porechop_log()
Read useful information from a Porechop log file
